<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Strix Defender](/Feats.aspx?ID=2646) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Strix" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=342" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 136 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your ancestral feud with humans gives you experience dealing with vicious foes, and your vengeance knows no bounds. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7), Perception, and [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) checks against [humans](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=6), as well as on damage rolls against humans with weapons and unarmed attacks. However, your hatred of humans is immediately obvious, giving you a –2 circumstance penalty to [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) checks against them and usually starting their attitude one step worse towards you.
name: Strix Defender
